alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 2:34PM MST until April 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM ARIZONA TIME /MIDNIGHT NAVAJO NATION TIME/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...The Grand Canyon Village, Supai, Yavapai County, and northern Gila County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Arizona time /midnight Navajo Nation time/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
